meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Sanders Bruce Marshall Claud Argall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2400.

td.p: Dave Sanders, a physician from Strathroy, Ontario Canada
Bruce Marshall, an astrologer from Cleveland Heights, Ohio
Claud Argall, a financial services manager from Sparks, Nevada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,398)

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
THE MOVIES
GAMBLING
SICKNESS & HEALTH
LANGUAGES
ELEPHANT ODDS & ENDS
